title: How To Grow Closer With Distance | Relationship Theory
description: In this week’s episode of Relationship Theory, Lisa and Tom discuss how to tackle the challenges of physical distance (both extended and temporary) during relationships, as well as the potential ways we can use distance to strengthen the connection with our partners. Start learning on Skillshare today at skillshare.com/impact Visit www.blinkist.com/IMPACT to try out the premium service completely free for 7 days! DISCUSSED IN THIS EPISODE What it takes to make a long distance work Common misunderstanding about the effort relationships demand Neurochemistry of falling in and out of love Opportunities to use distance to strengthen connection Tips on communications & use of technology to improve your relationship   FOLLOW TOM BILYEU TWITTER: http://bit.ly/2iyjY5P INSTAGRAM: http://bit.ly/2j7vqX8 FACEBOOK: http://bit.ly/2hPStWo   FOLLOW LISA BILYEU INSTAGRAM: http://bit.ly/2tMtCUX FACEBOOK: http://bit.ly/2rTysON   DOWNLOAD the Relationship Revelations Questionnairre: http://bit.ly/2GJp33N   DOWNLOAD the 25 Bullet Impact Theory Belief System: http://bit.ly/2ubknRe   SHOP: http://bit.ly/2rtRN8T  FACEBOOK GROUP: http://bit.ly/2rg1AjM TOM BILYEU READING LIST: http://bit.ly/2rZdpO9
